text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Tuavir nɨ izezir kamra, nɨ uamategh an mangɨ, Damaskusɨn nguibar ekiamɨn boroghɨra itir gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn otogh. Egh gɨn nɨ nguibamɨn aven mangɨ, Hasaelɨn ganigh borem an dapanim gingegh, anemɨseveghtɨ a Sirian kantrin atrivimɨn otogh.”
